mapper.select:
select equipment.id id, equipment.company_id companyId, equipment.qrcode qrcode, equipment.code code, equipment.name name,
equipment.spec spec, equipment.type type, type.name typeName, equipment.supplier supplier, equipment.dept_id deptId, equipment.buy_date buyDate,
equipment.remark remark, equipment.cuser cuser, equipment.cdate cdate, equipment.photo photo,
department.name deptName, department.long_name deptPathName,
CASE WHEN equipmentSensor.sensorTargetCount is null THEN 'N' WHEN equipmentSensor.sensorTargetCount is not null THEN 'Y' ELSE null END isBindSensor,
CASE WHEN equipmentSensor.sensorTargetCount is null THEN '非联网设备' WHEN equipmentSensor.sensorTargetCount is not null THEN '联网设备' ELSE null END bindSensorStateName,
CASE WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0002 is null and equipmentMaintain.equipment_id is null and equipmentRepair.equipment_id is null THEN '0' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0002 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0002 = '0' and equipmentMaintain.equipment_id is null and equipmentRepair.equipment_id is null THEN '0' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0002 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0002 = '1' and equipmentMaintain.equipment_id is null and equipmentRepair.equipment_id is null THEN '1' WHEN equipmentMaintain.equipment_id is not null and equipmentRepair.equipment_id is null THEN '2' WHEN equipmentRepair.equipment_id is not null THEN '3' ELSE null END equipmentState,
CASE WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0002 is null and equipmentMaintain.equipment_id is null and equipmentRepair.equipment_id is null THEN '待命中' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0002 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0002 = '0' and equipmentMaintain.equipment_id is null and equipmentRepair.equipment_id is null THEN '待命中' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0002 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0002 = '1' and equipmentMaintain.equipment_id is null and equipmentRepair.equipment_id is null THEN '工作中' WHEN equipmentMaintain.equipment_id is not null and equipmentRepair.equipment_id is null THEN '保养中' WHEN equipmentRepair.equipment_id is not null THEN '维修中' ELSE null END equipmentStateName,
CASE WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is null and equipmentAlarm.equipment_id is null THEN '0' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is null and equipmentAlarm.equipment_id is not null THEN '1' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0003 = '0' THEN '0' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0003 = '0' and equipmentAlarm.equipment_id is not null THEN '1' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0003 = '1' THEN '1' ELSE null END alarmState,
CASE WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is null and equipmentAlarm.equipment_id is null THEN '无故障' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is null and equipmentAlarm.equipment_id is not null THEN '故障' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0003 = '0' THEN '无故障' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0003 = '0' and equipmentAlarm.equipment_id is not null THEN '故障' WHEN equipmentSensorSource.A0003 is not null and equipmentSensorSource.A0003 = '1' THEN '故障' ELSE null END alarmStateName,
equipmentAlarm.equipment_id alarmId,
CASE WHEN equipmentSensorSource.equipment_id is not null THEN '1' else '0' END equipmentActivity, CASE WHEN equipmentSensorSource.equipment_id is not null THEN '在线' else '不在线' END equipmentActivityName
from vmes_equipment equipment left join vmes_department department on equipment.dept_id = department.id left join vmes_dictionary type on equipment.type = type.id
left join ( select equipment_id, count(id) sensorTargetCount from vmes_equipment_sensor
and equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
group by equipment_id ) equipmentSensor on equipment.id = equipmentSensor.equipment_id
left join ( select equipment_id, A0001, A0002, A0003 from vmes_sensor_source
and equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
and cdate <= now() and cdate >= date_add(now(), interval -30 minute)
order by cdate desc limit 1 ) equipmentSensorSource on equipment.id = equipmentSensorSource.equipment_id
left join ( select equipment_id from vmes_equipment_repair
and equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
and isdisable = '1' and equipment_state = '2' and is_stop = '1' and begin_time <= now() and IFNULL(end_time,now()) >= now()
order by cdate desc limit 1 ) equipmentRepair on equipment.id = equipmentRepair.equipment_id
left join ( select equipment_id from vmes_equipment_repair
and equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
and isdisable = '1' and equipment_state = '1'
order by cdate desc limit 1 ) equipmentAlarm on equipment.id = equipmentAlarm.equipment_id
left join ( select equipment_id from vmes_equipment_maintain
and equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
and isdisable = '1' and equipment_state = '2' and is_stop = '1' and is_valid_state = '1' and begin_time <= now() and IFNULL(end_time,now()) >= now()
order by cdate desc limit 1 ) equipmentMaintain on equipment.id = equipmentMaintain.equipment_id
and equipment.company_id = #{companyId}
and equipment.id = #{equipmentId}

select equipment_id equipmentId,max(A0004)-min(A0004) outputNum from vmes_sensor_source
and equipment_id = #{equipmentId}

select equipment_id equipmentId,DATE_FORMAT(cdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') startDate from vmes_sensor_source
and equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
and A0001 = '1'
order by cdate asc limit 1

select equipment_id equipmentId,DATE_FORMAT(cdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') collectDate from vmes_sensor_source
and equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
and A0001 = '1'
order by cdate desc limit 1
